title: I think matchmaking needs some work....

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: Most intense game of my life and I loved it and we somehow pulled out the win... but come on, really?

replies.body:
Up in the high elos there aren't as many players which makes matchmaking that much harder. Introduce dynamic que (where the systems tries to plant premades vs premades), it makes it pretty much impossible to have fully balanced mmr games.

 The system wants to match the premade 3 in the challenger team with another premade team (pref challenger), but if they cant get in the same mmr bracket they probably move down and it just so happened that the only other high elo premade 3 that was queing at that exact time was low diamond. 

Grats on the win tho :D

> [{quoted}](name=Princess Yaia,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=yxH9ZkLw,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-02-15T01:15:42.706+0000)
>
> Up in the high elos there aren't as many players which makes matchmaking that much harder. Introduce dynamic que (where the systems tries to plant premades vs premades), it makes it pretty much impossible to have fully balanced mmr games.
> 
>  The system wants to match the premade 3 in the challenger team with another premade team (pref challenger), but if they cant get in the same mmr bracket they probably move down and it just so happened that the only other high elo premade 3 that was queing at that exact time was low diamond. 
> 
> Grats on the win tho :D

They were 5 man Dynamic queue, while we had a 3 man dynamic consisting of 2 diamond 5s and a plat 5. We asked during the game because it baffled us.
But did anyone troll or afk......
